src:
Marcus Rashford, Lawan Tersulit yang Pernah Dihadapi Trent Alexander-Arnold
01 Nov 2019, 21:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Sebuah pengakuan dibuat oleh Trent Alexander-Arnold. Bek Liverpool itu mengakui bahwa Marcus Rashford adalah lawan terberat yang pernah ia hadapi sebagai seorang bek.
Duel pertama antara Rashford dan Alexander-Arnold itu terjadi di bulan Maret 2018 kemarin. Pada saat itu Jose Mourinho memasang sang striker sebagai pemain sayap kiri dan berduel melawan Alexander-Arnold.
Pada laga itu, Alexander-Arnold kewalahan menghadapi pemain asli Manchester itu. Alhasil Rashford berhasil mencetak dua gol di laga tersebut.
Alexander-Arnold mengakui bahwa pertandingan tersebut benar-benar menjadi laga tersulit yang pernah ia hadapi. "Pertandingan melawan United itu adalah pertandingan tersulit dalam aspek lawan yang pernah saya hadapi secara langsung," ujar Alexander-Arnold kepada The Athletic.

Baca komentar lengkap sang bek di bawah ini.
text:
Marcus Rashford, The Hardest Opponent Trent Trent-Arnold has ever faced
Nov 01 2019, 21:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - An acknowledgment was made by Trent Alexander-Arnold. The Liverpool defender admitted that Marcus Rashford was the toughest opponent he had ever faced as a defender.
The first duel between Rashford and Alexander-Arnold took place in March 2018 yesterday. At that time Jose Mourinho installed the striker as a left winger and dueled Alexander-Arnold.
In that match, Alexander-Arnold was overwhelmed by the Manchester native. As a result Rashford managed to score two goals in the match.
Alexander-Arnold admitted that the match was truly the most difficult match he had ever faced. "The match against United was the most difficult match in terms of opponents I have faced directly," Alexander-Arnold told The Athletic.

Read the full defender's comments below.
